cards.title: Sample title 1
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 1
cards.text: We act like humans, we talk like humans, and we think like humans. And we call out anyone who does the opposite.

cards.title: Sample title 2
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 2
cards.text: We insist on working collaborativelly. No rockstars. No departments. The whole owns the whole project together.

cards.title: Sample title 3
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 3
cards.text: Nothing is sacred, from our habits to our rituals, to our enviroment. Change is a natural part of the human life, and we prefer to embrace it.

cards.title: Sample title 4
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 4
cards.text: Most companies operate under the premise that employees should be replaceable like parts of an assembly line. We choose our people more carefully.

cards.title: Sample title 5
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 5
cards.text: You’re given an incredible amount of freedom and autonomy at gohenry. That goes for everyone.

cards.title: Sample title 6
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 6
cards.text: Our flat structure calls for it by necessity. Being a leader may feel unnatural at first, but we expect everyone to step up and own part of the project.

cards.title: Sample title 7
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 7
cards.text: Humans are not perfect. Don’t be afraid to fail. And when you do, you might as well fail spectacularly. This is how we grow and learn.

cards.title: Sample title 8
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 8
cards.text: Humans are unique. Do you love Portugueses Pop Music (Pimba)? Do you prefer your desk covered with sunflowers? There’s no need to hide it. Be yourself. That’s how you’ll fit in here.

cards.title: Sample title 9
cards.subtitle: Sample subtitle 9
cards.text: New hires are interviewed by the people who will be working with them. So get ready to care a lot about the people you work with.
